title: Instructional Design and Multimedia Production Workshop for Enhancing Competencies of Adult Elementary Foreign Language Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language teaching methodology and digital tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Learners are current elementary foreign language educators, requiring evening/weekend operations considering working professional characteristics

learning_goals: Learners can develop at least three instructional design models applicable in real educational settings.
Learners can independently produce learner-customized multimedia materials (videos, quizzes, interactive content).
Learners can diagnose causes of effective teaching strategies and failed cases with over 80% accuracy through case analysis.
Learners can write and submit educational project proposals in collaboration with partner institutions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
